mapper.sql: ID, BEAR_AGENT_ID, BEAR_AGENT_PID, AGENT_ID, RUN_LEVEL, RUN_AMT, SUPPLY_AMT, RUN_DATE, RUN_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, SUPPLY_DATE, SUPPLY_TIMES, SOUCE_ID, RUN_TYPE
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from P_BUCKLE_RUN
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into P_BUCKLE_RUN (ID, BEAR_AGENT_ID, BEAR_AGENT_PID, AGENT_ID, RUN_LEVEL, RUN_AMT, SUPPLY_AMT, RUN_DATE, RUN_STATUS, CREATE_TIME, SUPPLY_DATE, SUPPLY_TIMES, SOUCE_ID, RUN_TYPE) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bearAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bearAgentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{supplyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{runDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplyTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{souceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{runType,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

update P_BUCKLE_RUN
ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEAR_AGENT_ID = #{record.bearAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEAR_AGENT_PID = #{record.bearAgentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{record.agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_LEVEL = #{record.runLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_AMT = #{record.runAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPPLY_AMT = #{record.supplyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

RUN_STATUS = #{record.runStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLY_DATE = #{record.supplyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLY_TIMES = #{record.supplyTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOUCE_ID = #{record.souceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update P_BUCKLE_RUN set ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEAR_AGENT_ID = #{record.bearAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BEAR_AGENT_PID = #{record.bearAgentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGENT_ID = #{record.agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_LEVEL = #{record.runLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_AMT = #{record.runAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUPPLY_AMT = #{record.supplyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RUN_DATE = #{record.runDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_STATUS = #{record.runStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLY_DATE = #{record.supplyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLY_TIMES = #{record.supplyTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SOUCE_ID = #{record.souceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RUN_TYPE = #{record.runType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select SUM(RUN_AMT-SUPPLY_AMT) from P_BUCKLE_RUN where AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select pbr.AGENT_ID,pbr.BEAR_AGENT_ID,ppd.PARENT_AGENT_NAME as AGENT_NAME,pbr.RUN_AMT from (select * from P_BUCKLE_RUN where AGENT_ID = #{agentId} AND RUN_TYPE=1 AND RUN_STATUS='0' AND SUBSTR(RUN_DATE,0,6) = #{runDate}) pbr left join (select distinct PARENT_AGENT_NAME,PARENT_AGENT_ID,TRANS_MONTH from P_PROFIT_DIRECT) ppd on pbr.BEAR_AGENT_ID=ppd.PARENT_AGENT_ID and substr(pbr.RUN_DATE,0,6)=ppd.TRANS_MONTH ORDER BY RUN_LEVEL desc

select pbr.AGENT_ID,pbr.BEAR_AGENT_ID,ppd.PARENT_AGENT_NAME as AGENT_NAME,pbr.SUPPLY_AMT from (select * from P_BUCKLE_RUN where AGENT_ID = #{agentId} AND RUN_TYPE=2 AND RUN_STATUS='0' AND SUBSTR(SUPPLY_DATE,0,6) = #{runDate}) pbr left join (select distinct PARENT_AGENT_NAME,PARENT_AGENT_ID,TRANS_MONTH from P_PROFIT_DIRECT) ppd on pbr.BEAR_AGENT_ID=ppd.PARENT_AGENT_ID and substr(pbr.SUPPLY_DATE,0,6)=ppd.TRANS_MONTH ORDER BY RUN_LEVEL desc
select * from P_BUCKLE_RUN where BEAR_AGENT_ID = #{bearAgentId} AND RUN_TYPE=1 AND RUN_STATUS='0' AND SUBSTR(RUN_DATE,0,6) = #{runDate}
select * from P_BUCKLE_RUN where BEAR_AGENT_ID = #{bearAgentId} AND RUN_TYPE=2 AND RUN_STATUS='0' AND substr(SUPPLY_DATE,0,6)=#{runDate}
select * from P_BUCKLE_RUN where AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND RUN_STATUS='0' ORDER BY RUN_LEVEL DESC
mapper.update:
update P_BUCKLE_RUN
BEAR_AGENT_ID = #{bearAgentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BEAR_AGENT_PID = #{bearAgentPid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AGENT_ID = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_LEVEL = #{runLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_AMT = #{runAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUPPLY_AMT = #{supplyAmt,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RUN_DATE = #{runDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_STATUS = #{runStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLY_DATE = #{supplyDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLY_TIMES = #{supplyTimes,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SOUCE_ID = #{souceId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RUN_TYPE = #{runType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
